original_text:
Then the man said,
“This at last is bone of my bones
    and flesh of my flesh;
she shall be called Woman,
    because she was taken out of Man.”
korean_text: 아담이 이르되 이는 내 뼈 중의 뼈요 살 중의 살이라 이것을 남자에게서 취하였은즉 여자라 부르리라 하니라

sentences.original_text: This at last is bone of my bones and flesh of my flesh;
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 마침내 내 뼈中的 뼈요 내 살中的 살이로구나;

sentences.original_text: because she was taken out of Man.”
